Name: Minigame Game
About the game: Minigame Game is a first-person focused minigame collection that supports anywhere from 2-16 players. Grab your weapons and enter the 'Minigame Game' arcade! Test your skills! Shoot, bunnyhop, swing, and dance your way to victory in a variety of minigames designed to put your classic FPS skills to the test. Featuring 30+ minigames that will pit you with and against your friends. Get the high score! Whoever has the most points at the end of each minigame playlist is crowned the winner of the arcade. Your score and achievements are tracked to unlock cosmetics that you can show off! Level up! As you level up you’ll be able to choose from an ever-increasing selection of minigames. From fist fights and rocket jumping to shooting glass floors and swinging through space, there’s a minigame for everyone! Host your own arcade lobby! Compete in a random collection of minigames of your choosing with friends and other players online. Add modifiers such as increasing the number of rounds, enabling team selection, or even playing with bots.
